Key Match Events: The Mets were shut out 6-0 by the Brewers, managing only two hits
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso emphasized the need for the Mets to capitalize on opportunities and focus on future games
Brandon Nimmo stressed the importance of having a short-term memory and maintaining their preparation
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets are in the third NL Wild Card spot, one game back of the Atlanta Braves
The team's magic number is down to two games with the Arizona Diamondbacks losing on Saturday night
